title: Why did the Arcade Poro Icon get changed?
body: Can somebody explain why the icon has changed from a square icon with a rainbow border to just the poro in a circle border? [](https://ibb.co/muyjRk) [](https://ibb.co/bXZcCQ)

replies.body:
Can you clarify a bit more what you mean?  Do you mean the Summoner Icon?

Is it possible that you could take a screenshot of what it currently looks now for you?

It should help me look into this a bit further!

Not OP, but it used to look like [this](https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/pages/2017/august/arcade/img/arcade_poro_icon.jpg) and now it looks like [this](https://i.gyazo.com/8382362c29fc162893cc07bb654d4507.png)
this ^ , pls change it back riot nobody likes the new one and its not what we payed for

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FkB0uR9U,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-24T17:42:24.042+0000)
>
> Can you clarify a bit more what you mean?  Do you mean the Summoner Icon?

https://i.gyazo.com/8382362c29fc162893cc07bb654d4507.png
we need the icon we bought, not this new aberration!

Mr. Rito Man, 

I am also having the same issue and also am displeased, please revert the icon to its original thank you {{item:3073}}
I completely agree with everyone else, if this is going to be permanent I want a refund. I bought the bundle JUST for this icon.
yeah this is not what we paid for! We want the original logo back!

Please bring back the old, original icon... I literally bought the bundle only for it ;-;
I'm pretty sure nobody wants the poro in the circle or the rainbow background (the latest version of the icon). 
Bring back the dark colored, rainbow border poro icon please. :D

https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/pages/2017/august/arcade/img/arcade_poro_icon.jpg

Bump! Does anyone know if there's an update on it? I know this full rainbow border was put on to fix any issues that may have come on, but I really want this design back. Even a quick explanation would do wonders.
so is this getting looked at i loved how the icon looked
I want the Originial One back too RITO PLS! {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Revert or give us the original version as well please. Shouldn't be that hard.
It's different for me. The background is rainbow colored now instead of dark blue. (behind the poro)
